history.proof: intros. unfold sign. destruct (total_order_T 0 x) as [[Hx|Hx]|Hx]. - qsimpl time: 2 use: sign_le. qsimpl time: 2 use: Rplus_le_le_0_compat,sign_le. qsimpl time: 2 use: sign_ge_0,Rplus_le_le_0_compat,sign_le. qsimpl time: 2 use: sign_ge_0,Rplus_le_le_0_compat,sign_le. hauto use: Rlt_irrefl, Rle_lt_trans. - qsimpl time: 2 use: sign_ge_0,Rplus_le_le_0_compat,sign_le,sign_eq_1. - qsimpl time: 2 use: sign_eq_1,Rplus_le_le_0_compat,sign_le,sign_eq_m1,sign_ge_0. qsimpl time: 2 use: sign_eq_1,Rplus_le_le_0_compat,sign_le,sign_eq_m1,sign_ge_0. qsimpl time: 2 use: sign_eq_1,Rplus_le_le_0_compat,sign_le,sign_eq_m1,sign_ge_0,Rmult_le_0_l. qsimpl time: 2 use: sign_eq_1,Rplus_le_le_0_compat,sign_le,sign_eq_m1,sign_ge_0,Rmult_le_0_l,Rlt_mult_inv_pos. qsimpl time: 2 use: sign_eq_1,Rplus_le_le_0_compat,sign_le,sign_eq_m1,sign_ge_0,Rmult_le_0_l,Rlt_mult_inv_pos. hfcrush use: sign_0 unfold: Rgt.

exceptions.exn: In environment x : R H : x <= 0 Hx : 0 < x Unable to unify "sign ?M2295 < sign ?M2296 \\/ sign ?M2295 = sign ?M2296" with "1 < 0 \\/ 1 = 0".
In environment H0 : forall x y : R, x <= y -> sign x <= sign y x : R H : x <= 0 Hx : 0 < x Unable to unify "0 < ?M2433 + ?M2434 \\/ 0 = ?M2433 + ?M2434" with "1 < 0 \\/ 1 = 0".

In environment H2 : forall x y : R, x <= y -> sign x <= sign y H1 : forall r1 r2 : R, 0 <= r1 -> 0 <= r2 -> 0 <= r1 + r2 x : R H : x <= 0 Hx : 0 < x Unable to unify "0 < sign ?M2667 \\/ 0 = sign ?M2667" with "1 < 0 \\/ 1 = 0".

In environment H4 : forall x y : R, x <= y -> sign x <= sign y H3 : forall r1 r2 : R, 0 <= r1 -> 0 <= r2 -> 0 <= r1 + r2 H0 : forall x : R, 0 <= x -> 0 <= sign x x : R H : x <= 0 Hx : 0 < x Unable to unify "0 < x" with "1 <= 0".
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.
The LHS of sign_eq_1 (sign _) does not match any subterm of the goal
No such goal. Focus next goal with bullet -.
The LHS of sign_eq_m1 (sign _) does not match any subterm of the goal

In environment H4 : forall x : R, 0 <= x -> 0 <= sign x H3 : forall x : R, x < 0 -> sign x = -1 H2 : forall x y : R, x <= y -> sign x <= sign y H1 : forall r1 r2 : R, 0 <= r1 -> 0 <= r2 -> 0 <= r1 + r2 H0 : forall x : R, 0 < x -> sign x = 1 x : R H : x <= 0 Hx : 0 > x Unable to unify "0 < ?M3615 + ?M3616 \\/ 0 = ?M3615 + ?M3616" with "-1 < 0 \\/ -1 = 0".

In environment H9 : forall x : R, 0 <= x -> 0 <= sign x H8 : forall x : R, x < 0 -> sign x = -1 H7 : forall x y : R, x <= y -> sign x <= sign y H6 : forall r1 r2 : R, 0 <= r1 -> 0 <= r2 -> 0 <= r1 + r2 H5 : forall x : R, 0 < x -> sign x = 1 x : R H : x <= 0 Hx : 0 > x Unable to unify "?M3993 * ?M3994 < 0 \\/ ?M3993 * ?M3994 = 0" with "-1 < 0 \\/ -1 = 0".

In environment H10 : forall a b : R, 0 <= a -> b <= 0 -> a * b <= 0 H4 : forall x : R, 0 <= x -> 0 <= sign x H3 : forall x : R, x < 0 -> sign x = -1 H2 : forall x y : R, x <= y -> sign x <= sign y H1 : forall r1 r2 : R, 0 <= r1 -> 0 <= r2 -> 0 <= r1 + r2 H0 : forall x : R, 0 < x -> sign x = 1 x : R H : x <= 0 Hx : 0 > x Unable to unify "0 < ?M4467 * / ?M4468" with "-1 < 0 \\/ -1 = 0".

In environment H12 : forall x y : R, 0 < x -> 0 < y -> 0 < x * / y H11 : forall a b : R, 0 <= a -> b <= 0 -> a * b <= 0 H9 : forall x : R, 0 <= x -> 0 <= sign x H8 : forall x : R, x < 0 -> sign x = -1 H7 : forall x y : R, x <= y -> sign x <= sign y H6 : forall r1 r2 : R, 0 <= r1 -> 0 <= r2 -> 0 <= r1 + r2 H5 : forall x : R, 0 < x -> sign x = 1 x : R H : x <= 0 Hx : 0 > x Unable to unify "0 < ?M5037 * / ?M5038" with "-1 < 0 \\/ -1 = 0".

original: intros x H. unfold sign. destruct (total_order_T 0 x) as [[Hx|Hx]|Hx]. - apply sign_le. + apply Rplus_le_le_0_compat; auto. + apply sign_ge_0. apply Hx. - rewrite sign_eq_1; auto. apply Rplus_le_le_0_compat; auto. - rewrite sign_eq_m1; auto. apply Rplus_le_le_0_compat. + apply Rmult_le_0_l. apply Fourier_util.Rlt_mult_inv_pos; auto. + apply Rlt_mult_inv_pos; auto.
